plugins.name: Hello World
plugins.description: A simple test plugin that displays a customizable message
plugins.author: LEDMatrix Team

plugins.name: Simple Clock
plugins.description: A simple clock display with current time and date
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: Weather Display
plugins.description: Comprehensive weather display with current conditions, hourly forecast, daily forecast, UV index, wind direction, and weather icons. Features state caching, API counter tracking, and error handling. Powered by OpenWeatherMap API with beautiful weather icons.
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: Static Image Display
plugins.description: Display static images on your LED matrix with automatic scaling, aspect ratio preservation, and transparency support. Perfect for logos, artwork, or custom graphics.
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: Scrolling Text Display
plugins.description: Display custom scrolling or static text with configurable fonts, colors, and scroll speed. Perfect for announcements, messages, or custom displays.
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: Of The Day
plugins.description: Display daily featured content like Word of the Day, Bible verses, or custom daily items. Supports multiple categories with rotating display and configurable data sources.
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: Music Player
plugins.description: Displays 'Now Playing' information from Spotify or YouTube Music, including album art and scrolling text
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: Google Calendar
plugins.description: Display upcoming events from Google Calendar with date, time, and event details. Shows next 1-3 events with automatic rotation and timezone support.
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: Hockey Scoreboard
plugins.description: Live, recent, and upcoming hockey games across NHL, NCAA Men's, and NCAA Women's hockey with real-time scores and schedules
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: Football Scoreboard
plugins.description: Standalone plugin for live, recent, and upcoming football games across NFL and NCAA Football with real-time scores, down/distance, possession, and game status. Now with organized nested config!
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: UFC Scoreboard
plugins.description: Live, recent, and upcoming UFC fights with fighter headshots, records, odds, and fight results. Based on original work by Alex Resnick (legoguy1000).
plugins.author: LegoGuy1000

plugins.name: Basketball Scoreboard
plugins.description: Live, recent, and upcoming basketball games across NBA, NCAA Men's, NCAA Women's, and WNBA with real-time scores and schedules
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: Baseball Scoreboard
plugins.description: Live, recent, and upcoming baseball games across MLB, MiLB, and NCAA Baseball with real-time scores and schedules
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: Soccer Scoreboard
plugins.description: Live, recent, and upcoming soccer games across multiple leagues including Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, MLS, and more
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: Odds Ticker
plugins.description: Displays scrolling odds and betting lines for upcoming games across multiple sports leagues including NFL, NBA, MLB, NCAA Football, and more
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: Sports Leaderboard
plugins.description: Displays scrolling leaderboards and standings for multiple sports leagues including NFL, NBA, MLB, NCAA Football, NCAA Basketball, and more
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: News Ticker
plugins.description: Displays scrolling news headlines from RSS feeds including sports news from ESPN, NCAA updates, and custom RSS sources
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: Stock News Ticker
plugins.description: Displays scrolling stock-specific news headlines and financial updates from RSS feeds, focused on market news and company updates
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: Stocks Ticker
plugins.description: Displays scrolling stock tickers with prices, changes, and optional charts for stocks and cryptocurrencies
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: Flight Tracker
plugins.description: Real-time aircraft tracking with ADS-B data, map backgrounds, flight plans, and proximity alerts
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: Christmas Countdown
plugins.description: Display a festive countdown to Christmas with a stylized Christmas tree logo and stacked text. Features split-screen layout with large tree on left and countdown text on right. Shows 'MERRY CHRISTMAS' on and after December 25th.
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: Olympics Countdown
plugins.description: Display a countdown to the next Olympics (summer or winter) with an Olympics logo. Automatically determines the next Olympics and counts down to the opening ceremony. Once the Olympics starts, switches to countdown to the closing ceremony. Supports Olympics through 2032.
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: YouTube Stats
plugins.description: Display YouTube channel statistics including subscriber count, total views, and channel name on your LED matrix. Features YouTube logo, auto-refresh, and efficient caching.
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: 7-Segment Clock
plugins.description: Display a retro-style 7-segment clock with customizable colors
plugins.author: LEDMatrix

plugins.name: MQTT Notifications
plugins.description: Display text or images from HomeAssistant via MQTT. Supports dynamic MQTT topics with wildcard support for flexible notification handling that interrupts the normal display rotation.
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: Countdown Display
plugins.description: Create and manage customizable countdowns with images. Perfect for birthdays, holidays, events, and special occasions.
plugins.author: ChuckBuilds

plugins.name: Web UI Info
plugins.description: Displays the web UI URL for easy access. Shows 'visit web ui at http://[deviceID]:5000'
plugins.author: LEDMatrix
